Articles.Content: I love this game, but I'm clueless as to what purpose this serves
yeah you can click it to decide how many parts you want to (symmetries?)

In the default mode, you only place one item/object at a time. With symmetry mode on, you'll create many items/objects at the same time. This is useful when you're placing wings or rockets at the side of another rocket.

Wow, I wish I figured this out sooner! Placing those wings were such a pain! THANKS!

Just one more question, is there a volume control?

no volume controll yet it is planned in a future update though !

you should be able to tune it down in windows if your using vista or windows 7

Just one more question, is there a volume control?

As a workaround, if you're on Windows 7, you can click the volume control in the notification area, hit 'Mixer', then drag the slider for KSP down below your other programs.
I'm in Windows 7, and I don't know if its different in other versions, but if you go into Settings in the main menu or pause menu, there should be an audio tab.
